item.title: Discounting in a relativistic universe
item.description: For people who want to discount the future, special relativity creates some challenges. There are different ways to handle those but none seem completely satisfactory which may be yet another argument against discounting pure utilities.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m trying to have a positive impact on the world by making sure that artificial intelligence will be aligned with humanity’s interests. Currently, I’m a BSc students in physics at Heidelberg university. I’ll begin an AI Master’s in Amsterdam this September. Among other things, I’m interested in causality, foundational questions in physics, information theory, paradoxa, Emacs, chess and personal productivity. Only time will tell which of those things I will blog about here.
